name: County Offices to Close for Juneteenth
description: In observance of Juneteenth, all public San Diego County offices, libraries, family resource centers and animal shelters will be closed Monday, June 19.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
In observance of Juneteenth, all public San Diego County offices, libraries, family resource centers and animal shelters will be closed Monday, June 19.
Law enforcement, emergency animal control response and other essential services will continue through the holiday.
County parks, campgrounds and neighborhood day-use parks remain open 365 days a year. However, the following locations will be closed:

Fallbrook Community Center
Lakeside Community Center
Spring Valley Community Center
Spring Valley Gymnasium
4S Ranch Recreation Office only (all parks will be open)
Community Teen Centers
Valley Center Community Center

Camping reservations can always be made online, but the Department of Parks and Recreation’s reservation phone line will not be staffed during the holiday.
All County public health clinics will be closed Monday. Some of the County’s partner and contract sites for COVID-19 testing will be open. Check coronavirus-sd.com for more information.
All County offices will resume normal business hours Tuesday, June 20.
